# The `MacroFusion` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Post-process the DAG to create cluster edges between instrs that may be fused by the processor into a single operation. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Post-process the DAG to create cluster edges between instrs that may be fused by the processor into a single operation.
